tool_description: API Showing latest climate changes around the world
name: ClimateChangeLiveByAparna
title: ClimateChangeLiveByAparna

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets news about climate change from a particular newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangelivebyaparna.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangelivebyaparna.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangelivebyaparna.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangelivebyaparna.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
